interface.name: ToplevelStateListener
interface.comment: two different methods for that case if ICCCM states (WithdrawnState, IconicState, NormalState) has the same integer values as Java states (Frame.ICONIFIED, Frame.MAXIMIZED_BOTH, Frame.MAXIMIZED_HORIZ, Frame.MAXIMIZED_VERT) They will be invoked from different peers in order not to mix different states having same codes.
